passwordPolicy: hashIterations(21683) and upperCase(1) and lowerCase(1) and digits(1) and length(8) and passwordHistory(3) and notUsername(undefined) and hashAlgorithm(pbkdf2-sha256)

authenticationFlows.description: Handle what to do if there is existing account with same email/username like authenticated identity provider
Used by Docker clients to authenticate against the IDP
Actions taken after first broker login with identity provider account, which is not yet linked to any Keycloak account
Username, password, otp and other auth forms.
Reset credentials for a user if they forgot their password or something
